terms.content:
Terms of Service

Welcome to our platform, a comprehensive marketplace connecting clients and service partners.

1. Platform Overview

Our platform provides a unique ecosystem where:

  • Clients can publish diverse advertisements for services they require
  • Partners can offer their professional services and respond to client needs

2. User Responsibilities

All users must:

  • Provide accurate and truthful information
  • Maintain professional communication
  • Respect the platform's guidelines and legal requirements

3. Client Responsibilities

Clients using the platform to publish advertisements must:

  • Clearly describe service requirements
  • Provide realistic expectations
  • Communicate transparently with potential service partners

4. Partner Responsibilities

Service partners must:

  • Possess necessary qualifications for offered services
  • Respond promptly to client inquiries
  • Deliver services with professionalism and integrity

5. Transaction and Communication

The platform facilitates connections but is not directly responsible for:

  • Service quality
  • Pricing negotiations
  • Final agreements between clients and partners

6. Intellectual Property and Privacy

All content on the platform is protected. Users must respect intellectual property rights and adhere to privacy policies.

7. Limitation of Liability

Our platform provides a service marketplace and is not liable for direct or indirect damages arising from user interactions.

8. Modifications to Terms

We reserve the right to update these terms. Continued platform use constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

Last Updated: {{ 'now'|date('Y-m-d') }}
